title: LA-17-07: Increased Gifts and Travel Reimbursements Reporting Threshold for Financial Disclosure Reports and Nonsponsor Widely Attended Gatherings Gift Exception Ceiling
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/EA746350CB2EE66F852585BA005BEC40/$FILE/LA-17-07 Increased Gifts Threshold and Nonsponsor WAG Gift Exception Ceiling.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory discusses the recent amendments to the gifts and travel reimbursements reporting threshold at 5 C.F.R. §§ 2634.304 and 2634.907(g) and the widely attended gathering (WAG) gift exception ceiling for nonsponsor gifts of free attendance at 5 C.F.R. § 2635.204(g)(3).
